levelledPara.title: Function
levelledPara.para: The panel skin encloses the center fuselage body and provides aerodynamic continuity between the forward bulkhead and the wing root. It supports distributed loads and contributes to overall structural stiffness.

levelledPara.title: Construction
levelledPara.para: The skin panels are made of carbon fiber composite with embedded copper mesh for lightning protection. Reinforced zones include aluminum alloy doublers around access panels and sensor mounts.

levelledPara.title: Installation
levelledPara.para: Panels are bonded and riveted to longitudinal stringers and circumferential frames. Removable sections allow access to internal systems and sensor cabling. Sealant is applied along all joints to ensure pressure integrity.

levelledPara.title: Compliance
levelledPara.para: The panel skin meets CS-25.773 for external surface integrity and DO-160G Section 22 for lightning strike protection. It is validated under the badge BH-STA350_SKEL_VALIDATED.
